familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received 4500000 in Ordinary Business Income income from BROADBAND PROLIFERATION PARTNERS, LLC (WiredScore; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Broadband Proliferation Partners, LLC (Wiredscore; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Managing Member of Broadband Proliferation Partners, LLC from Dec 1, 2012, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received 4500000 in Ordinary Business Income income from BROADBAND PROLIFERATION PARTNERS, LLC (WiredScore; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. As of Kushner's July 20, 2017, financial disclosure, this asset was in the divestment process. However, because the asset is not known to have been divested, this database categorizes the potential conflict as active.
familyMemberEthics.business: Broadband Proliferation Partners, LLC (Wiredscore; New York, NY)
